casebody.data:
SUN TRUST BANK, et al.
v.
RIZO. No. 105P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 8, 2007. Alan D. McInnes, Raleigh, for Sun Trust Bank.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of February 2007 by Defendants for Petition for a Discretionary Supreme Court Review:

*564"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of March 2007."
